sentences.sContent: They accommodate by greatly changing the curvature of the cornea.
sentences.sContent_eng: They accommodate by greatly changing the curvature of the cornea.
sentences.sCn: 它们由大大地改变角膜曲率的方法来调节。

sentences.sContent: Squamous cell carcinoma of the cornea or conjunctiva: a rare tumour of the surface of the eye.
sentences.sContent_eng: Squamous cell carcinoma of the cornea or conjunctiva: a rare tumour of the surface of the eye.
sentences.sCn: 角膜或结膜鳞状细胞癌：眼睛表面的一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.sContent: Pterygium is a triangular sheet of fibrovascular tissue that invades the clear cornea from the bulbar conjunctiva, and has a high recurrence rate after simple excision.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pterygium is a triangular sheet of fibrovascular tissue that invades the clear cornea from the bulbar conjunctiva, and has a high recurrence rate after simple excision.
sentences.sCn: 翼状胬肉是一三角形纤维血管组织，从球结膜侵入透明角膜，在单纯切除术后具有很高的复发率。

trans.tranOther: the transparent protective covering on the outer surface of your eye
